p.s: Spa is a place you can create with little or no capital .
It is not a business but a mindset .
It is a place for your client to feel comfortable , happy , and calm .

list.item:
Get an Apartment .
If you are sleeping under a bridge that 's ok , just be aware that you may not be ready to start a world class Sleep Spa .
First you 're going to need a clean and comfortable apartment in a pretty nice neighborhood .
You do n't want your client to have to fight criminals or wolves on the way to your doorstep .

item.s: Get some amenities .
Its important to have a way to differentiate yourself from other Sleep Spas .
That 's the surest way to attract high quality clientele .
Clients like things like sleep masks , clean sheets , cooling fans , warm furnaces , and pleasing lighting schematics .
Definitely make sure you have these and once your operation is underway start to add new features as frequently as possible .
Some of the most notable full service Sleep Spas offer personal chefs , chauffeurs , and in-house physical therapists .
Building a Sleep Spa from the ground up can be daunting but its important to remember that new amenities and features can be added slowly over time .

figure.rend: Sleepmask Ocean close up by Love Me Sugar.jpg

item.s: Pick a a motto .
You may consider focusing on the sleep experience when creating a tag line for your Sleep Spa .
A motto like " The Sleep Spa , where everybody gets nine hours " is a great way to market and draw attention to your budding business .
Get a client .
A Sleep Spa is just an apartment without a lovely client to bring your services to life .
Clients come in many shapes and forms , but keep in mind that the best Sleep Spas cater to only one client at a time so make sure you chose your client wisely !
Continue to provide world renowned sleep services .
A Sleep Spa is live-changing undertaking .
As many small business owners say , you will have to work 24/7 when you are operating a Sleep Spa , but at least you can pick the days and the hours !
Do n't overbook your Sleep Spa .
It 's ok to have more than one guest at the Spa on occasion , but keep this to a minimum .
When running a Sleep Spa , your product is a luxury experience .
You do n't want to diminish this by creating a Youth Hostel .
If you are eventually considering turning your Sleep Spa into a franchise , consider reinvesting all of your dividends for rapid grow .
Make sure to ask your client for constant feedback about the climate , conditions , and amenities at your Sleep Spa .
She will have definite ideas and preferences and this is an invaluable guide while you are starting out .
Remember to let your client get at least 9 hours of sleep !
